attributes.action: Remove our PM Mrs May from number 10 if she dose not get Great Britain out soon
attributes.background: 17.5 million people voted to leave the EU and we are still in it

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which include petitions calling for Ministers to be sacked.  The Prime Minister is appointed by the Queen and continues in office for as long as s/he wishes, subject to being able to demonstrate the support of the House of Commons.
